Chicken.name: Chicken Biryani
Chicken.para: A classic dish made by layering rice over slow cooked chicken gavy and juicy pieces to keep you satisfied!

Chicken.name: Chicken Chilli
Chicken.para: Enjoy this spicy dish of chicken cooked in soy sauce with capsicum, chilli and pepper is a treat to your tastebuds!

Manchurian.name: Veg Manchurian
Manchurian.para: It is an exotic dish made of mixed vegetable steamed formed into dumplings deep fried and cooked in a tangy sauce

Manchurian.name: Paneer Manchurian
Manchurian.para: It is an exotic dish made of mixed vegetable steamed formed into dumplings deep fried and cooked in a tangy sauce

Paneer.name: Paneer 65
Paneer.para: Chunks of paneer marinated in spicy Hyderabadi masala, fried till crispy

Paneer.name: Paneer Kadhai
Paneer.para: A mild sweet taste creamy curry made with onion, tomatoes, cashews, cream and butter
